channel.title: Text Finding
channel.description: Is there a way to have SCAR find a phrase and then click on it? I am making a mage trainer for the lesser demon in the wizard tower, and I am trying to figure out a way to have the mouse click on "Attack Lesser Demon" because if you just left click on him the option is to "walk here".

item.title: Text Finding
item.dc:creator: @Monkmonk693 Monkmonk693
item.description:
@Monkmonk693 wrote:

I can crop the image, just someone said that you needed to press alt+prnt Scrn so that’s why it didn’t work. Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Text Finding
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Monkmonk693:

I would but for some reason when I press alt+Print SCreen, nothing happens and I can’t crop the image and stuff…

Just Prnt screen, push ctrl + v in paint. If you can’t take a screenshot and crop it you should reconsider scripting.

Read full topic

item.title: Text Finding
item.dc:creator: @Starblaster100 Starblaster100
item.description:
@Starblaster100 wrote:

remove SRL then and add

if(FindBitmapMaskTolerance(CreateBitmapMaskFromText('Attack',UpChars),x,y,3,3,515,338,10,85))then
  Begin
  Mouse(x + 10, y + 3, 2, 1, true);
  Wait(10000);
  end;

Read full topic

item.title: Text Finding
item.dc:creator: @d3ltr33 d3ltr33
item.description:
@d3ltr33 wrote:

includes should come before the main program and the variables and procedures etc.

program MageTrainer;

{.include SRL/SRL.scar}

Var
SpellColor,x,y,a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j:integer;

begin
SetUpSRL;
SpellColor:= 0//Please pick spell color–it’s not automatic
a:= 682

Read full topic

item.title: Text Finding
item.dc:creator: @Monkmonk693 Monkmonk693
item.description:
@Monkmonk693 wrote:

Lol.
I downloaded SRL, put it in my includes folder and included it in the script, but when I run the script this message come up:
Line 4: [Error] (5:1): Unknown identifier ‘Rar’ in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\Scripts\magictrainer.scar

I can’t figure out what is wrong. Help would be greatly appreciated.

This is my script so far, incase you have any suggestions:

program MageTrainer;
Var SpellColor,x,y,a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j:integer;
begin
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
SetUpSRL;
SpellColor:= 0//Please pick spell color–it’s not automatic
a:= 682
b:= 417
c:= 839
d:= 635
g:= 714
h:= 638
MoveMouseSmooth(a,b)
ClickMouse(a,b,true)
wait(750)
MoveMouseSmooth(c,d)
ClickMouse(c,d,true)
wait(1000)
FindColor(x,y,SpellColor,680,447,858,603)
MoveMouseSmooth(x,y)
ClickMouse(x,y,true)
wait(2000)
MoveMouseSmooth(g,h)
ClickMouse(g,h,true)
wait(2000)
repeat
FindColoredAreaTolerance(e,f,330582,286,400,507,574,100,10)
MoveMouseSmooth(e,f)
ClickMouse(e,f,false)
wait(1000)
ChooseOption(‘Attack Lesser Demon’)
wait(10000)
until(false)
end.

Read full topic

item.title: Text Finding
item.dc:creator: @Arkanor Arkanor
item.description:
@Arkanor wrote:

LIEK OMG U HUGE NOB!!1!1!

Kidding, obviously. SRL is SCAR Resource Library. It’s the latest and greatest include, created and updated by some of the best SCAR scripters still active. Forums are http://www.villavu.com/forums/
